1.title: Episode #2.1

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Avni's parents think of Prateek as the perfect match for Avni. At a party, Prateek meets Ranbir and introduces him to Avni. Later, Utkarsh spikes Avni's drink, resulting in her losing control. Thus, infuriated Prateek gets into a fight with Utkarsh.

2.title: Episode #2.2

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Avni, Prateek, Sarthak, Rose and Ranbir's drunken escapades bring them to the same hospital with which they are supposed to start their medical career.

3.title: Episode #2.3

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Avni, Prateek, Sarthak, Rose and Ranbir attend their first class with Professor Vivaan who decides to make it memorable for them by making them collect samples of urine and stool from patients and also orders them to clean the washrooms.

4.title: Episode #2.4

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: While the entire class was frivolously cleaning the washroom, Vivaan enters and scolds them for not being serious. Avni gets expelled for not attending classes regularly. At the end Pratheek manages to bring Avni back to class by convincing Meghna.

5.title: Episode #2.5

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Vivaan orders the students to spend a day in the morgue. Avni tries to save a nurse's job by secretly replacing her in the operation theatre but when Vivaan finds out her identity, he becomes shocked to see her resemblance to Dhara.

6.title: Episode #2.6

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Vivaan feels distressed because of Avni's facial resemblance with Dhara. Avni and her friends apologize to Vivaan for their mistakes and Vivaan gives them the task of babysitting in the nursery.

7.title: Episode #2.7

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: The class despite several mistakes does a good work in the nursery. Vivaan tells the class to pick a team leader among them. He later angrily orders Avni to work in the mortuary, she gets scared to see a child in front of her in the mortuary.

8.title: Episode #2.8

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Avni rescues the haunted child from the mortuary and admits him in the hospital. However, Vivaan gets distressed and locks up Avni in the mortuary unaware of the extreme cold temperature.

9.title: Episode #2.9

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: The fiendish child returns to the hospital and threatens to snatch Vivaan's loved ones from him, causing Vivaan to fear for their safety.

10.title: Episode #2.10

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Vivaan rescues Avni on time and tries to convince the child to use his powers in a positive manner by empathising with him. Later, the students experience their first delivery operation and Ranbir performs well and makes the doctor proud.

11.title: Episode #2.11

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: Vivaan throws the flowers given by Avni but Avni walks in at that time and apologizes to him. Later, both Avni and Vivaan feel bad about Vivaan's behavior towards her. During the night shift, the interns encounter an evil spirit in the hospital.

12.title: Episode #2.12

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: Yamini calls the nurse when she sees Sarthak hit his head as he hastily makes his way down the stairs. Vivaan uses his powers to look into Mary's past and asks her not to hurt innocent people. Later, Avni informs Vivaan about Sarthak's coma.

13.title: Episode #2.13

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

13.plot: Vivaan finds evidence related to the deaths. Later, in the graveyard, Rose, Ranbir, Prateek and Seher try to find bloody Mary. Vivaan also attempts to save the haunted hospital but is shocked to know that Avni saved Sarthak.

14.title: Episode #2.14

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

14.plot: Vivaan tries to dodge Avni but incidentally gets stuck in an elevator with her. Meanwhile, Ramesh despises Vivaan for the appreciation he recieves and uses a formula to prove himself otherwise to the people in the hospital.

15.title: Episode #2.15

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

15.plot: With the zombie outbreak spiralling out of control, Vivaan is running out of time in his quest to invent the antidote. Despite his scepticism, Vivaan eventually realises that the only person who can help him is Avni.

16.title: Episode #2.16

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

16.plot:

17.title: Episode #2.17

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

17.plot: Vivaan is insecure as he anticipates the effects of the virus. Later, Ranbir finds his bike set on fire in the parking lot and vows to get back at whoever committed this atrocity.

18.title: Episode #2.18

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

18.plot: Rose invites her friends over for a costume party. The clown gets entry to the party and plans on trapping Ranbir with his spell. Meanwhile, Vivaan watches the crime videos and figures out that Ranbir is in danger.

19.title: Episode #2.19

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

19.plot: A mysterious clown hypnotises Ranbir, tortures him and attempts to kill him. Vivaan rescues Ranbir at the last ditch and kills the psycho clown. Meanwhile, Avni is drooling over Vivaan and confesses to Rose about her growing affection towards him.

20.title: Episode #2.20

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

20.plot: Avni and Rose discuss about Vivaan's interest towards her. Meanwhile, Vivaan realizes that there is no future with Avni. Later, Vivaan gets irritated and shouts at Avni ordering her to stay away from him which breaks Avni's heart.

21.title: Episode #2.21

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

21.plot: Vivaan and Anvi's argument leads her to believe that she was wrong about him. Seher lies to Sam when he asks her where she is. Vivaan later bumps into Sarthak and suspects his odd behaviour.

26.title: Episode #2.26

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

26.plot: Sarthak pursues after Yamini to steal the file which contains details about the injection. Meanwhile, Ranbir tries to hide Seher from his friends. Sarthak succeeds in getting the file through the pizza delivery boy and discovers Vivaan's secrets.

27.title: Episode #2.27

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

27.plot: Rose gives Avni ideas that force her to believe that she is in love with Vivaan. Meanwhile, Vivaan hears that the file has been misplaced. He later gives Yamini an antidote asking her to inject it into Sarthak's bloodstream.

28.title: Episode #2.28

30.title: Episode #2.30

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

30.plot: Sameer is shocked to know that Seher works in the hospital and is Ranbir's ex-girlfriend. Later, the interns plan a party in the hospital and Rose contemplates inviting Sameer to the party.

31.title: Episode #2.31

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

31.plot: In order to rehabilitate Sarthak, Yamini gives him drugs to help him stabilize. When She calls Vivaan, Sarthak secretly overhears the conversation and gets to know about the antidote.

32.title: Episode #2.32

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

32.plot: Everyone plans on throwing a New Year party but Avni is not interested. Meanwhile, Yamini tells Avni about her love for Sarthak. Later, Sarthak injects himself to get the powers of a vampire.

33.title: Episode #2.33

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

33.plot: Joe and Avni bond over the New Year party. Sarthak needs the fourth file and abducts Sarthak. Vivaan goes back in the coffin while Seher's brother attacks Ranbir.

34.title: Episode #2.34

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

34.plot:

35.title: Episode #2.35

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

35.plot: Rose is miffed at Samir for attacking Ranbir. Avni and Rose plan to settle the differences between Samir and Ranbir. Seher and Ranbir's secret meeting is intercepted by Seher's family. Later, Samir saves Ranbir from getting killed by his father.

36.title: Episode #2.36

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

36.plot: Seher's father disowns her when he comes to know about her affair with Ranveer. Sarthak is suspicious anout Jo's activities. Avani tells Jo about her feelings for Vivaan.

37.title: Episode #2.37

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

37.plot: Yamini gets upset when Sarthak tears her dress while hugging him and, she runs away from him annoyed by his behavior. Later, Sarthak murders Pratik's father when he refuses to handover the vials to him.

38.title: Episode #2.38

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

38.plot: Avni sneaks in Dr. Vivaan's office and finds the coffin. Vivaan tells Avni that he is a vampire when she awakens him. Vivaan gets to know that Avni is a pure blood. Jo tells Vivaan about Prateek's kidnapping by a creature with claws.

39.title: Episode #2.39

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

39.plot: Vivaan finds out about Sarthak's violent behavior from Yamini. Later, Meghna in Jo's disguise takes the vials from Vivaan and gives it to Sarthak which makes Sarthak very happy as the vials will make him invincible and help him destroy Vivaan.

40.title: Episode #2.40

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

40.plot: Avni sees her past and realizes that she and Vivaan were lovers in her previous life. Vivaan urges Sarthak to use the antidote but Sarthak doesn't listen to him. Meghna urges Sarthak to get Avni's blood in order to get more powerful than Vivaan.

41.title: Episode #2.41

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

41.plot: Vivaan traces that Avni is abducted by Sarthak and Meghna in order to kill her and use her holy blood. Vivaan drinks Avni's holy blood which turns him into an invincible vampire and thus he kills equivalent vampire Sarthak and the sorcerer Meghna.

1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: A group of men abduct Princess Iravati and burns her alive. Then Anshuman turns her into a vampire.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Vivaan rescues Anshuman from the wolves and takes him home.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Preet introduces Vivaan to Dhara, but she refuses to shake hands with him. They play chess with Preet keeping a close watch. Meanwhile, Iravati searches for Anshuman and goes on a killing spree.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Dhara is shocked to see Preet walking effortlessly in the air. Although she tells Dhara to do the same, she fails.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Anshuman draws the sketches of Preet and Dhara while Vivaan explains the details. Later, Preet asks Vivaan about his feelings for Dhara. Meanwhile, Preet senses the presence of Iravati and tells Faridaji to get the magic box.

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Vivaan talks to Dhara and tells her to come out of the house, but she refuses and tells him about the rules of the Haveli. Finally, Vivaan convinces Dhara and takes her to the lake. Meanwhile, Preet has a vision of Vivaan and Dhara.

7.title: Episode #1.7

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Ranbir's father sets out to find Iravati while Ranbir warns Vivaan and Dhara about Iravati. He then goes in search of his father. However, Iravati attacks both Ranbir and his father.

8.title: Episode #1.8

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Anshuman gives a holy thread to Vivaan and tells him to carry it for his protection. Later, Vivaan is attacked by Iravati when he goes out to get pastries for Preet. Although Iravati gets close to Vivaan, she is pushed away by a mysterious power.

9.title: Episode #1.9

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: Dhara and Vivaan help Meet and Mahi meet each other. As Preet comes looking for Mahi, Dhara runs to save them from getting caught. Later, Vivaan consoles Anshuman who consoles him and tells him not to be afraid of Preet.

10.title: Episode #1.10

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Preet takes the first step towards executing her evil plans. Elsewhere, Meet unintentionally brings trouble by sending a disguised Ira to Vivaan's doorstep.

11.title: Episode #1.11

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: Preet wants to take revenge against Meet and Mahi. Meanwhile, Vivaan is shattered when he sees his relatives becoming the victims of Ira's rage.

12.title: Episode #1.12

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: Preet murders Meet and Mahi for having an affair and Dhara becomes a witness to the gruesome event. Preet question Dhara's loyalty, while Ira's rage leads to Seher's murder.

13.title: Episode #1.13

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

13.plot: Iravati reminds Anshuman about his real mission when he meets Preet after 14 years. Preet then finds out about Anshuman's plan to capture the moonstone and also Iravati's real identity.

14.title: Episode #1.14

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

14.plot: Vivaan's eternal love for Dhara never diminishes. However, in spite of Vivaan's several pleas, Dhara abandons him. Then, Vivaan wins the cycling competition despite trying to lose. Later, Anshuman gets suspicious of Preet.

15.title: Episode #1.15

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

15.plot: Although the evil powers have plotted against Vivaan and Dhara, their love and affection keeps them together.

16.title: Episode #1.16

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

16.plot: Vivaan tries to confront Dhara but realizes that she still doesn't remember anything. Meanwhile, Anshuman plans to save Vivaan as Preet awaits the perfect opportunity to kill Vivaan.

17.title: Episode #1.17

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

17.plot: Adhrij beats up Vivaan. Abhimanyu then urges Adhrij to make Dhara fall in love with him. Later on seeing Vivaan's condition, Ansh helps him get out of the trap and takes revenge by beating up Adhrij. In the end, Dhara finally recognizes Vivaan.

18.title: Episode #1.18

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

18.plot: Dhara rejects Vivaan's love plea. However, Vivaan places a gift for Dhara on the staircase, which makes her recall her old childhood days with Vivaan. Later, Dhara develops feelings for Vivaan.

19.title: Episode #1.19

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

19.plot: Adhrij kidnaps Vivaan and abandons him in a jungle. Meanwhile, Iravati gets close to Dhara to understand Anshuman's intentions. Later, Abhimanyu asks Adhrij to win over Dhara's love.

20.title: Episode #1.20

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

20.plot: Adhrij gets uncomfortable when Dhara asks him about the whereabouts of Vivaan. Later, Dhara confesses about her feelings for Vivaan to a nun.

21.title: Episode #1.21

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

21.plot: Dhara is desperately looking for Vivaan and calls Preet to help her. Later, with the help of her locket, she finds the unconscious Vivaan in the forest and helps him. In the interim, Anshuman witnesses the naming ceremony of a newly born werewolf.

22.title: Episode #1.22

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

22.plot: Abhimanyu tells Faridaji that they can obtain the power of the moonstone by sacrificing true love. He then sends a wolf to attack Vivaan but Vivaan kills the wolf by throwing his locket. Later, Vivaan reveals his feelings for Dhara.

23.title: Episode #1.23

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

23.plot: Dhara is shocked to hear the secrets of the Haveli. Although Vivaan and Dhara takes shelter in the Haveli, they face many devastating situations. Later, Dhara returns to Adhrij. Meanwhile, Vivaan meets Preet at her house.

24.title: Episode #1.24

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

24.plot: Adhrij introduces Dhara to his family. On the other hand, when Preet comes to take Dhara back home, she tells Preet that she has a soft corner not for Vivaan, but Adhrij. Later, Vivaan's friend consoles and counsels him.

25.title: Episode #1.25

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

25.plot: Preet meets baby Vidhyut for the first time in Abhimanyu's house. Later Abhimanyu tells Preet that he has adopted Vidhyut. In the interim, Vivaan meets Dhara in a restaurant and challenges her that he will make Dhara fall in love with him.

26.title: Episode #1.26

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

26.plot: Preet is shocked and furious to see the failure of her attempts at performing witchcraft on Dhara. The next morning, she talks about her plan to get Dhara and Adhrij engaged. Although Preet tries to provoke Vivaan's feelings for Dhara, she fails.

27.title: Episode #1.27

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

27.plot: Abhimanyu is intrigued when Preet invites everyone to the Haveli. Meanwhile, Preet is skeptical about Dhara's love for Adhrij.

28.title: Episode #1.28

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

28.plot: Vivaan sees Adhrij and Dhara together and gets jealous. However, Dhara ultimately falls for Vivaan and shares a passionate moment at the same spot where they once bonded as kids. Later, Dhara and Vivaan talk about each other and get closer.

29.title: Episode #1.29

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

29.plot: Preet finds out about Dhara and Vivaan's plan to escape and becomes furious at her. Preet threatens to kill Vivaan in spite of Dhara begging for his life. Although Dhara confesses her love to Vivaan, she tells him that she cannot marry him.

30.title: Episode #1.30

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

30.plot: Dhara lays bare her feelings for Vivaan. Meanwhile, Abhimanyu comes to know that Anshuman is a vampire, and also, Preet finally finds Anshuman, the love of her life, and wants to know why he had left her.

31.title: Episode #1.31

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

31.plot: Preet desperately desires to reunite with Anshuman. Meanwhile, Adwik reveals that he and Abhimanyu are werewolves and Anshuman is a vampire. Later, Faridaji traps Preet in the Royal Mirror and forces Dhara to marry Adhrij.

32.title: Episode #1.32

episode of.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (TV Series 2014– )

32.plot: Adrij refuses to sacrifice his life to get the power of the moonstone, this causes a conflict among the werewolves. Abhimanyu tries to kill Anshuman but Preet saves him with her powers and punishes the werewolves.

imdb.plot outline: Vivaan is the only left Vampire in town who lost his love 20 years back. Since last 20 years he is searching his love but in vain. Now the only aim of his life is to become human and die. For this he joins a hospital for his research work to invent a solution he can inject in himself to turn back to human. But in this course he is asked to mentor the incoming first year medical students at the hospital. During which he gets sensations of a past reminder. This is the story of his search of death and love.
imdb.title: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story
akas: MTV Fanaah: An Impossible Love Story (India)
plot: The complexities of a love story featuring supernatural entities such as vampires and werewolves and witch.::Dibyayan Chakravorty

Vivaan is the only left Vampire in town who lost his love 20 years back. Since last 20 years he is searching his love but in vain. Now the only aim of his life is to become human and die. For this he joins a hospital for his research work to invent a solution he can inject in himself to turn back to human. But in this course he is asked to mentor the incoming first year medical students at the hospital. During which he gets sensations of a past reminder. This is the story of his search of death and love.
